## Learning Objective

After this session you will (a) understand the bias/variance trade-off
in model fitting, (b) appreciate the implications of regularization
strategies and the role of hyperparameter tuning, and (c) have a range
of evaluation measures and strategies.

## Required Readings

1. Bishop, Christopher M. 2006. *Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning*. New York: Springer. (available online) Ch 1, 3

## Optional Readings 

2. CRAN Task View: Reproducible Research. https://cran.r-project.org/web/views/MachineLearning.html
3. Bishop, Christopher M. 2006. *Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning*. New York: Springer.
